```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(HockeyModel)
params<-updateModel(save_data=FALSE)
```

Hello

Today is `r Sys.Date()`. Here are today's game odds:

```{r today, echo=FALSE}
todayodds(params=params, include_xG=T)
```

Here are the odds for the next week's games (covering `r Sys.Date()+1` to `r Sys.Date()+7`):

```{r week, echo=FALSE}
odds<-list()
for(d in c(1:7)){
  cat(d)
  odds[[d]]<-todayOdds(params=params, today=as.Date("2019-11-01")+d)
  odds[[d]]$Date<-as.Date("2019-11-01")+d
}
do.call('rbind', odds)

odds
```
